aka: I Would Like to Own a Hardware Store in Andalusia

cast.name: 赫苏斯·阿里亚斯 Jesús Arias

director.name: 卡莱斯·普约尔 Carles Prats

this_title: Quiero tener una ferretería en Andalucía
trans_title: 我想在安达卢西亚开家五金店
I Would Like to Own a Hardware Store in Andalusia
introduction: Since the mid-70s, Joe Strummer, the former leader of The Clash, was irresistibly attracted to Andalusia. This documentary is a fun and revealing chronicle of the adventures of Strummer in Granada and Almeria, of his trying to leave behind his rock star aura, to get away from the myth of The Clash and become anonymous. By Srta Pérez
chinese_title: 我想在安达卢西亚开家五金店
foreign_title: Quiero tener una ferretería en Andalucía
